text: Two weeks ago, I made a video asking you to make me a video
telling me the highlight of your year.
This is a fun way for you to practice your English and for me to get to know more about you.
Also the whole world, to get to know more about you.
So here are your videos. I had so much fun watching them.
Learning the highlight of your year for some of you was a trip
like the guy who did a trip across America. I've done that several times. It's so much fun!
I had a lot of fun watching your video and I also loved learning about people's achievements in work
or in school or things you did for an internship, this kind of thing.
What a wonderful year you all had.
Thank you so much for sharing a little bit of it with me.
Now without further ado, thank you for your courage.
